title: Iron division is a waste of time
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x-bHek6B-10&amp=&amp=&amp=&feature=youtu.be&amp=&amp=&amp=&t=1400

Cool, So I made a new account and I'm legit vsing problematic golds which is a complete waste of my time, Riot wants me to go through 3 whole rankings of playing with gold players to finally be in league where i should be vsing golds, "4 divisions now so its less grindy and you see progression quicker" you just have to win 50 games in a row to be in the rank of the players you're vsing.

what is this company doing? this is a complete waste of time.

replies.body: This is the problem. They say you face players of your own skill level, but that's bullshit. Even 30lp per win is not enough to justify the fact that if you have to play against an elo, you should be in that elo. I think if they want to do this, they should lock it so that you can't play against higher tiers than you can queue with. Who cares if you stomp some poor iron players who think that smurfs are in all their games? This way we can at least get out of iron...
totally agree, the 30lp gains arent enough, we need atleast 60+
